lyrics:
45 contributorspimp remix lyricschorus 50 cent

that im a motherfuckin pimp

but a bitch cant get a dollar outta me
no cadillac no perms you cant see

now shorty she in the club she dancing for dollars

that bcbg burberry dolce  gabbana
shes feeding fools fantasies they pay her cause they want her

a hour later have that ass up in the ramada

im that nigga trying to holla cause i want some bread

bitch hit the track catch a date and come pay the kid
look baby this is simple you cant see
you fuckin with me  you fuckin with a pimp
see 50 cent liveget tickets as low as 49you might also likechorus 50 cent
i dont know what you heard about me
but a bitch cant get a dollar outta me
no cadillac no perms you cant see
that im a motherfuckin pimp

ggggg gmix

so they can snatch these braids out and put my shit in a perm word word

an im a muthafuckin pimp

when your neck and wrist glow she already should know
